amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Office of the Commissioner and the Office of Legislative Affairs at IRS by $2 million and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for operations support at IRS by $2 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Camp amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Camp amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Camp.
